I somehow only found this song a couple of years ago after 2020 lockdown . I was listening to afterglow when it was new and then heard this and realised how similar I though they sounded, so I listened to photograph again. And again. And again. Until I had memorised every single note and none could go unnoticed in my head. Then, in 2021, we went into lockdown in New Zealand for 2 terms and so I taught myself how to play it. The I taught my brother. Now I must know how to play at least 50 or so of his songs - that I can remember. I am so shocked that I had no idea who he was in 2020, disappointed in myself for not knowing that all the songs I loved were by him. He literally saved my life in lockdown twice. Thanks Ed.
